<h3 id="X31487">X(31487) = CENTROID OF CURVATURES OF THESE CIRCLES: {2nd LEMOINE, STAMMLER, STEINER}</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; 3*a^4-12*S*a^2-5*(b^2+c^2)*a^2+2*(b^2-c^2)^2  :  :

<br>
<b>X(31487) = 3*X(6447)+2*X(31414)</b>
<p>X(31487) lies on these lines:
{2,6427}, {3,9680}, {5,1588}, {6,3411}, {20,6221}, {30,6447}, {140,6428}, {371,382}, {376,9692}, {381,3592}, {485,3843}, {517,31440}, {548,1587}, {550,6519}, {590,5070}, {615,6500}, {631,3312}, {632,19053}, {999,31475}, {1151,15696}, {1335,31480}, {1505,31492}, {1656,6419}, {1657,6425}, {1703,31447}, {3069,16239}, {3070,9681}, {3316,18762}, {3523,6448}, {3524,6522}, {3528,6455}, {3530,6398}, {3534,6453}, {3544,3590}, {3594,15720}, {3832,13886}, {3853,6459}, {3855,18538}, {3856,23259}, {3861,31412}, {4309,19030}, {4317,19028}, {5054,6420}, {5067,7584}, {5410,15559}, {5418,6418}, {5420,6501}, {6407,6560}, {6421,31470}, {6426,15693}, {6450,7581}, {6451,6460}, {6470,6565}, {6496,21734}, {7486,7582}, {9589,31439}, {9605,31465}, {9624,13888}, {9709,31486}, {9711,31485}, {10195,15703}, {11314,13637}, {13901,31452}, {13904,31474}, {13905,15888}, {19111,20379}</p>
<p>
X(31487) = {X(i), X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (1588, 3068, 13925), (3068, 3311, 8976), (3311, 8976, 13785)<br>
